title: ISic004276. Epitaph of Caia Coprilla
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) M(anibus)
C(aia) ((·)) Copril-
la ((·)) v(ixit) ((·)) an(nis)
XXXXII
5⟦[------]⟧

Apparatus criticus

Text according to ILipara 766

English translation

To the spirits of the departed. Caia Coprilla lived for 42 years.

Italian translation

Agli spiriti dei defunti. Caia Coprilla visse per 42 anni.

commentary
